conbody.p: Wind River Titanium Server is a high-performance, high-availability Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) cloud solution capable of meeting demanding customer requirements for scalability, performance, capacity, and availability. It is not a one-size-fits-all solution but a highly flexible framework that provides a range of deployment models, types and quantity of hardware used, and tunable parameters to enable an optimized deployment for varying customer requirements.

Titanium Server brings together the flexibility and scalability of the IT cloud and the high-availability and performance demanded by the Telecommunications industry into a unique carrier grade, industry-leading solution to deliver a price-performance ratio well above alternative solutions. Titanium Server is aligned with the ETSI-NFV architecture.

This document provides engineering guidelines, rules, and system parameters to assist cloud architects, installers, and administrators in deploying and scaling the Titanium Server system to meet application-specific requirements. Failure to follow the recommendations, guidelines and engineering rules will result in unknown performance trade-offs likely compromising reliability and performance.
